newsitem.title: SPAIN: Three wounded in Spain gun battle, mistaken identity.
newsitem.headline: Three wounded in Spain gun battle, mistaken identity.

text.p: One Basque national policeman and two civil guards were injured on Saturday in the northern Spanish city of Bilbao when they mistakenly fired on one another, local media reported.

The gun battle, which took place shortly after a car bomb exploded in Bilbao late on Friday, occurred when a national police patrol stopped to check a car following it that the officers mistakenly considered suspicious.
The wounded were taken to nearby hospitals and two were operated on for abdominal and leg wounds.
Rebels of the ETA (Basque Homeland and Freedom) movement have killed some 800 people in their 30-year drive for Basque independence and have stepped up the tempo of the violence this year.
